Rômulo Meira-Góes

Publication

Journals

  1. R. Meira-Góes, J. Weitze and S. Lafortune "A compact and uniform approach for synthesizing state-based property-enforcing supervisors for discrete-event systems" in IEEE Transaction on Automatic Control, conditionally accepted 2021.

  2. R. Meira-Góes, R.H. Kwong and S. Lafortune "Synthesis of optimal multi-objective attack strategies for controlled systems modeled by probabilistic automata" in IEEE Transaction on Automatic Control, in print 2021. [PDF]

  3. R.H. Moulton, B. Behinaein Hamgini, Z.A. Khouzani, R. Meira-Góes, F. Wang, K. Rudie "Using Subobservers to Synthesize Opacity-Enforcing Supervisors" in Discrete Event Dynamic Systems, conditionally accepted 2021.

  4. R. Meira-Góes, H. Marchand and S. Lafortune "Synthesis of Supervisors Robust Against Sensor Deception Attacks" in IEEE Transaction on Automatic Control, 2021. [PDF]

  5. R. Meira-Góes, E. Kang, R.H. Kwong and S. Lafortune "Synthesis of sensor deception attacks at the supervisory layer of Cyber–Physical Systems" in Automatica, vol. 121, pp. 109172,2020. [PDF]

Peer-reviewed Conferences

  1. R. Meira-Góes, C. Keroglou, and S. Lafortune "Towards probabilistic intrusion detection in supervisory control of discrete event systems" in 21st IFAC World Congress, 2020. [PDF]

  2. R. Meira-Góes and S. Lafortune "Moving Target Defense based on Switched Supervisory Control: A New Technique for Mitigating Sensor Deception Attacks" in 15th Workshop on Discrete Event Systems, 2020. [PDF]
    Best Paper Award Finalist

  3. S. Mohajerani, R. Meira-Góes, and S. Lafortune "Efficient Synthesis of Sensor Deception Attacks Using Observation Equivalence-Based Abstraction" in 15th Workshop on Discrete Event Systems, 2020. [PDF]

  4. Z. Wang, R. Meira-Góes, S. Lafortune, and R.H. Kwong "Mitigation of Classes of Attacks using a Probabilistic Discrete Event System Framework" in 15th Workshop on Discrete Event Systems, 2020. [PDF]

  5. R. Meira-Góes, H. Marchand and S. Lafortune "Towards resilient supervisors against sensor deception attacks" in 58th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control, 2019. [PDF]

  6. R. Meira-Góes, R.H. Kwong and S. Lafortune "Synthesis of Sensor Deception Attacks for Systems Modeled As Probabilistic Automata" in 2019 American Control Conference, 2019. [PDF]

  7. R. Meira-Góes, B.C. Rawlings, N. Recker, G. Willett and S. Lafortune "Demonstration of Indoor Location Privacy Enforcement using Obfuscation" in 14th Workshop on Discrete Event Systems, pp. 145-151, 2018. [PDF]

  8. R. Meira-Góes, E. Kang, R.H. Kwong and S. Lafortune "Stealthy Deception Attacks for Cyber-Physical Systems" in 56th IEEE Conference on Decision and Control, pp. 4224-4230,2017. [PDF]

In Progress

  1. R. Meira-Góes, H. Marchand and S. Lafortune "Dealing with sensor and actuator deception attacks in supervisory control" under review in Automatica, 2021.
